title: The Bachelorette's Ali Oetjen shows off her incredible figure in skimpy black bikini
text:
Ali Oetjen is ready for the upcoming summer.

The former Bachelorette soaked up some sun on Thursday, showing off her amazing figure in a skimpy black bikini.

Sharing a photo to Instagram, the 33-year-old beamed for the camera as she worked on her tan.

'Grateful for sunshine today!' The Bachelorette's Ali Oetjen (pictured) showed off her incredible figure in skimpy black bikini in an Instagram snap shared on Thursday

Laying on an orange blanket in what appeared to be a nature strip, the beauty was free of makeup, showing off her natural glow.

Her hair up off her face, the blonde wore a simple A letter necklace, and had bare feet.

She shared a similar photo in July taken at a different location and with her dog in the background.

Loves that bikini! She shared a similar photo in July taken at a different location and with her dog in the background

It comes after Ali shared her grueling workout routine with fans, before joking about how 'shiny and sweaty' she was after the training session.

'I'm so sweaty and that was such a good workout... look how shiny and sweaty I am! Secret to the glow, that sweat!' she said with a laugh in a video posted to Instagram.

The blonde bombshell enjoyed 30 minutes of circuit training.

Hard worker! It comes after Ali shared her grueling workout routine with fans, before joking about how 'shiny and sweaty' she was after the training session

After a warm up on the treadmill, she spent more time running on the machine before using a rower.

She then did skipping, jump squats, and some more sprinting intervals before calling it a day.

Ali explained she enjoyed the session after her first workout back after seven weeks off.
description: Ali Oetjen is ready for the upcoming summer.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
